title: Hello, Google. I am a pixel4xl mobile phone user. I have a problem and need your help. When the phon
content: Hello, Google. I am a pixel4xl mobile phone user. I have a problem and need your help. When the phone was turned on, I removed the back cover of the phone, and then the face recognition failed. I can no longer use my face to unlock the phone. I want to know: is this hardware damage or software failure? Looking forward to your answers
